mapper.select: SELECT MON.SCHE_TIME SCHETIME, COALESCE(MON_LECT.lec_lect_title, '빈강의실') AS LECMON, COALESCE(TUE_LECT.lec_lect_title, '빈강의실') AS LECTUE, COALESCE(WED_LECT.lec_lect_title, '빈강의실') AS LECWED, COALESCE(THU_LECT.lec_lect_title, '빈강의실') AS LECTHU, COALESCE(FRI_LECT.lec_lect_title, '빈강의실') AS LECFRI FROM DAYTIMESCHEDULE MON JOIN DAYTIMESCHEDULE TUE ON MON.SCHE_TIME = TUE.SCHE_TIME JOIN DAYTIMESCHEDULE WED ON MON.SCHE_TIME = WED.SCHE_TIME JOIN DAYTIMESCHEDULE THU ON MON.SCHE_TIME = THU.SCHE_TIME JOIN DAYTIMESCHEDULE FRI ON MON.SCHE_TIME = FRI.SCHE_TIME LEFT JOIN LECTURESCHEDULE MONSCHE ON MON.SCHE_CD = MONSCHE.SCHE_CD AND monsche.clas_cd = #{scheCd} LEFT JOIN LECTURESCHEDULE TUESCHE ON TUE.SCHE_CD = TUESCHE.SCHE_CD AND tuesche.clas_cd = #{scheCd} LEFT JOIN LECTURESCHEDULE WEDSCHE ON WED.SCHE_CD = WEDSCHE.SCHE_CD AND wedsche.clas_cd = #{scheCd} LEFT JOIN LECTURESCHEDULE THUSCHE ON THU.SCHE_CD = THUSCHE.SCHE_CD AND thusche.clas_cd = #{scheCd} LEFT JOIN LECTURESCHEDULE FRISCHE ON FRI.SCHE_CD = FRISCHE.SCHE_CD AND frische.clas_cd = #{scheCd} LEFT JOIN lecture MON_LECT ON MONSCHE.LEC_CD = MON_LECT.lec_cd LEFT JOIN lecture TUE_LECT ON TUESCHE.LEC_CD = TUE_LECT.lec_cd LEFT JOIN lecture WED_LECT ON WEDSCHE.LEC_CD = WED_LECT.lec_cd LEFT JOIN lecture THU_LECT ON THUSCHE.LEC_CD = THU_LECT.lec_cd LEFT JOIN lecture FRI_LECT ON FRISCHE.LEC_CD = FRI_LECT.lec_cd WHERE MON.SCHE_DAY = 'mon' AND TUE.SCHE_DAY = 'tue' AND WED.SCHE_DAY = 'wed' AND THU.SCHE_DAY = 'thu' AND FRI.SCHE_DAY = 'fri' ORDER BY MON.SCHE_TIME

SELECT clas_cd , sche_cd , lec_cd , CASE SUBSTR(sche_cd,1,1) WHEN '월' THEN TO_NUMBER(1 || SUBSTR(sche_cd,2,1)) WHEN '화' THEN TO_NUMBER(2 || SUBSTR(sche_cd,2,1)) WHEN '수' THEN TO_NUMBER(3 || SUBSTR(sche_cd,2,1)) WHEN '목' THEN TO_NUMBER(4 || SUBSTR(sche_cd,2,1)) WHEN '금' THEN TO_NUMBER(5 || SUBSTR(sche_cd,2,1)) END AS week FROM LECTURESCHEDULE WHERE lec_cd = #{lecCd} order by week
